text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi I m proud of our p.m narendraji modi .. to take a correct decision ... yes the lockdown is only way to stop covid-19 .. yes i vote for lockdown expention beyond 14 april beccoz the cases in gujarat are increasing day by day ... yes i will be happy if lockdown is extend ..
